Package com.testpaper.model

Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.testpaper.model.Question
@Entity public class Question extends Object
The Question class represents a question entity in the system. It contains information such as the question ID, question text, image (if any), answer options, correct answer, and the test to which the question belongs.
Since:
21-06-2023
Version:
17
Author:
TPG team
